content:
Need clarification to help us map the codes in the adjudication category code system from the carin-bb 2020Feb version:

Is the codecobamount here: https://www.hl7.org/fhir/us/carin-bb/2020Feb/ValueSet-CARIN-BB-Adjudication-Amount-Category.html the same as benefit here https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-bb/branches/v1.1.0/ValueSet-C4BBAdjudicationCategoryDiscriminator.html ?

thanks.
